ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p:
An auxiliary_characteristic_dimension_representation is a
that implements the ARM concept of where the ARM attribute "auxiliary_dimension_representation" has a value of TRUE.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A curve_dimension is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The name of the curve_dimension shall not be 'angular'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A datum_difference is a subtype of and that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The datum_difference shall be applied to only .
The datum_difference name attribute inherited shall be identical in each supertypes.
The datum_difference description attribute inherited shall be identical in each supertypes.
The datum_difference shall be applied to only different .
The datum_difference shall not be in a complex instance of other types of or .

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A datum_difference_based_characteristic is a that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The datum_difference_based_characteristic shall be related to exactly one .

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A dimensional_size_property is a and a .

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: An edge_segment_vertex is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The edge_segment_vertex shall not participate in a complex instance of other than with the supertype.
The edge_segment_vertex shall be related to one representation with a name of 'shape element characterization'.
The edge_segment_vertex shall be in the 'physical design occurrence' or 'physical design usage' context.
The edge_segment_vertex shall be a single datum.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A geometric_tolerance_group is a that implements the ARM concepts of and .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The geometric_tolerance_group shall have a description of either 'separate requirement' or 'simultaneous requirement'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to at least one geometric_tolerance_with_specified_datum_system to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'simultaneous requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to at least two physical_unit_geometric_tolerances to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero linear_profile_tolerance with a name of 'linear profile refinement' to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero surface_profile_tolerance with a name of 'surface profile refinement' to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero position_tolerance with a name of 'feature relating position' to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero , to specify the 'group geometric tolerance', that are not either linear_profile_tolerance, surface_profile_tolerance, or position_tolerance.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: An opposing_boundary_dimensional_size is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The name of the opposing_boundary_dimensional_size shall be either 'angular' or 'linear'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A physical_unit_datum is a that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The physical_unit_datum shall have a description of 'axis', 'plane', 'point' or 'null'.
The physical_unit_datum shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
The physical_unit_datum shall have a name of 'single datum', 'common datum', or 'null'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'common datum' it shall be related to at least one datum_system as a 'datum usage in datum system'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'common datum', it shall relate to at least two to specify the 'datum feature usage in common datum'.

If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'axis' and the physical_unit_datum is not related to a datum_reference_frame as a 'reference axis', it shall have a name of either 'common datum' or 'single datum'.

If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'plane' and the physical_unit_datum is not related to a datum_reference_frame as a 'reference plane', it shall have a name of either 'common datum' or 'single datum'.

If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'point' and the physical_unit_datum is not related to a datum_reference_frame as a 'reference origin', it shall have a name of either 'common datum' or 'single datum'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'single datum', it shall be related to at least one datum_system as a 'datum usage in datum system'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'single datum', it shall relate to no more than one to specify the 'datum feature usage in single datum'.
The name and description of the physical_unit_datum shall not both be an empty string.
If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'plane', it shall have at most two property_definitions with the description of 'datum direction property'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A physical_unit_datum_feature is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The physical_unit_datum_feature shall have exactly one property that has the description of 'datum feature identification'.
The physical_unit_datum_feature shall be related by at least one with a name of either 'datum feature usage in common datum' or 'datum feature usage in single datum'.
The physical_unit_datum_feature shall be related to at most one as a 'datum feature usage in single datum'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A physical_unit_datum_target_set is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The physical_unit_datum_target_set shall relate to at least one to specify the 'datum target usage'.
The physical_unit_datum_target_set shall not be related to a as a 'constituent'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is a and a that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The value of two name attributes of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be identical.
The specified as the definition of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be the same specified as the toleranced_shape_aspect by the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance.

If the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is neither a geometric_tolerance_with_specified_datum_system, a linear_profile_tolerance, a surface_profile_tolerance, nor a position_tolerance, the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be either 'circularity', 'cylindricity', 'flatness', or 'straightness'.
If the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is 'circularity', it shall not be a .
If the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is 'cylindricity', it shall not be a .
If the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is 'flatness', it shall not be a .
The physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be related to at most one with a description of 'simultaneous requirement' as the 'group geometric tolerance'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A positional_boundary is a that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The positional_boundary shall have a description of either 'dimension related positional boundary' or 'profile related positional boundary'.
The positional_boundary shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
If the description of the positional_boundary is 'dimension related positional boundary', the positional_boundary shall relate to at least one to specify the 'boundary member'.

If the description of the positional_boundary is 'dimension related positional boundary', the positional_boundary shall either relate to exactly one that lies on the boundary of the shape of the product to specify the 'constrained feature' or relate to exactly one to specify the 'constrained feature'.

If the description of the positional_boundary is 'dimension related positional_boundary', the positional_boundary shall have exactly one that has the description of 'dimension related positional boundary property'.

If the description of the positional_boundary is 'profile related positional boundary', the positional_boundary shall have exactly one that has the description of 'profile related positional boundary property'.
If the description of the positional_boundary is 'profile related positional boundary' it shall relate to exactly one to specify the 'positional boundary and profile boundary member'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A positional_boundary_member is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The positional_boundary_member shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
The positional_boundary_member shall have exactly one that has the description of 'positional boundary member property'.
The positional_boundary_member shall be related to exactly one as the 'boundary member', and that shall have a description of 'dimension related positional boundary'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A statistical_dimensional_location is a that implements the combination of the ARM concepts and .

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A statistical_dimensional_size is a that implements the combination of the ARM concepts and .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The statistical_dimensional_size shall be related to at most one as the 'substitutable dimension'.
The statistical_dimensional_size shall relate to a to specify the 'dimensional tolerance statistical control requirement'.
If the statistical_dimensional_size is related to a , as the 'substitutable dimension', that shall not be a statistical_dimensional_size.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A statistical_geometric_tolerance is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The statistical_geometric_tolerance shall be related to at most one as the 'substitutable geometric tolerance'.
The statistical_geometric_tolerance shall relate to exactly one to specify the 'geometric tolerance statistical control requirement'.
The statistical_geometric_tolerance shall be related to exactly zero statistical_geometric_tolerance as the 'substitutable geometric tolerance'.

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A tolerance_zone_boundary is a that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: If the description of the tolerance_zone_boundary is 'conical', it shall not be either a or a .
If the description of the tolerance_zone_boundary is 'circular or cylindrical or spherical', it shall not be either a or a .
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall not be both a and a .
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall have exactly one that has the description of either 'boundary zone definition with specified size' or 'conical tolerance zone boundary'.
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall be specified as the boundaries by exactly one .

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p:
A tolerance_zone_explicit_opposing_boundary_set is a that implements the ARM concepts of
and .

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: A tolerance_zone_implicit_opposing_boundary_set is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: The viewing_plane is a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The viewing_plane shall have a description of 'affected plane'.
The viewing_plane shall have exactly one that has the description of 'viewing plane property'.
The viewing_plane shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
